import React from 'react' import { render } from 'react-dom' import IosPlane from 'react-ionicons/lib/IosPlane' import IosCreateOutline from 'react-ionicons/lib/IosCreateOutline' const PriceList = ({ items,onModifyItem,onDeleteItem}) =>{ return (
    { items.map((item) => (
  • {item.title} {(item.category.type ==='income')?'+':'-'} {item.price}RMB {item.date} {onModifyItem(item)}}>
    • )) }
) } export default PriceList
